title: 2018 Pokemon World Championships Streaming Schedule
body:
2018 Pokemon World Championships Streaming Schedule

Competitive Pokémon play takes the global stage for the 2018 Pokémon World Championships, beginning Friday, August 24. The Pokémon Company International will broadcast four streams live on Twitch, including a main stage stream that will rotate gameplay content and show all the finals matches. The live stream from Nashville, Tennessee, will feature interesting matches all three days of the…

View On WordPress

blog.name: etrianexplorer
blog.title: An Etrian Odyssey Untold Blog: The Millennium Gay
blog.description: Nintendo. Etrian Odyssey. Pikmin. Metroid. Bayonetta. Zelda. Manatees. Atlus, please give Etrian Odyssey Switch mapping, pwease Atwus??

summary: In an obscene turn of events, an Etrian Odyssey x Pokémon crossover is just you starting out on a normal Pokémon adventure, only...
body: In an obscene turn of events, an Etrian Odyssey x Pokémon crossover is just you starting out on a normal Pokémon adventure, only to find that your starter Pokémon are a Furyfawn, a Baby Muckdile, and a Baby Harvester, and from there all the “Pokémon” you face are just monsters and FOEs from Etrian Odyssey with types assigned to them.

reblog.comment: In an obscene turn of events, an Etrian Odyssey x Pokémon crossover is just you starting out on a normal Pokémon adventure, only to find that your starter Pokémon are a Furyfawn, a Baby Muckdile, and a Baby Harvester, and from there all the “Pokémon” you face are just monsters and FOEs from Etrian Odyssey with types assigned to them.

trail.content_raw: In an obscene turn of events, an Etrian Odyssey x Pokémon crossover is just you starting out on a normal Pokémon adventure, only to find that your starter Pokémon are a Furyfawn, a Baby Muckdile, and a Baby Harvester, and from there all the “Pokémon” you face are just monsters and FOEs from Etrian Odyssey with types assigned to them.
trail.content: In an obscene turn of events, an Etrian Odyssey x Pokémon crossover is just you starting out on a normal Pokémon adventure, only to find that your starter Pokémon are a Furyfawn, a Baby Muckdile, and a Baby Harvester, and from there all the “Pokémon” you face are just monsters and FOEs from Etrian Odyssey with types assigned to them.

blog.name: pokegodsandmissingno
blog.title: P̵o̵K̸é̴G̸o̸D̷s̸ and Frightful Things to Come?
blog.description: There is a growing desire and expectation of humans here on Earth in making full contact with PoKéMoN who are still unknown. Back in 1995, when I saw my first UPM (Unindexed Pocket Monster), I found out very quickly that other people thought you were totally crazy if you said you saw such things. The world has changed quite a bit since then when I was a child. In fact, in late 1997, a poll taken in Kanto shows that for the first time ever, more than fifty percent of residents now believe in PokéGODS's. Since then, there have been polls that put the figure at over eighty percent or more.

summary: Hm. Hard to decide what my team would look like if I didn’t go the monotype-route because there are too many options but:...
body:
Hm. Hard to decide what my team would look like if I didn’t go the monotype-route because there are too many options but:

  • Starter would be a Togepi, obviously, of course
  • Early on I’d get an Eevee and evolve it to an Umbreon
  • Deino as obligatory pseudo-legendary because muppet friend is a good friend

reblog.comment:
